title: BIndex
description: A schema to describe artifacts (e.g., libraries) for automatic recognition and integration with GenAI engines.

id.description: A unique identifier for the artifact (e.g., Maven coordinate or UUID).

name.description: The full name of the artifact or library. For Maven artifacts, use groupId:artifactId.

version.description: Version of the artifact (e.g., semantic versioning, tag, or hash).

location.description: Details about the artifact's storage location, repository type, and metadata.

repositoryType.description: Type of repository (e.g., Maven, NPM, Git, DockerHub, PyPI).

repositoryUrl.description: URL of the repository hosting the artifact.

coordinates.description: Coordinates identifying the artifact within the repository.

group.description: Group or namespace of the artifact (e.g., Maven groupId).

artifactId.description: Name of the artifact within its group (e.g., artifactId in Maven).

extension.description: File extension or type (e.g., JAR, WAR, tar.gz, whl).

description.description: A brief description of the artifact's purpose and functionality.

author.description: Describes the author or organization responsible for the artifact.

name.description: Name of the author or organization.

website.description: Link to the website or documentation.

tags.description: Tags or keywords describing the artifact.

classification.description: Categorizes the artifact by type, domain, and supported languages.

type.description: Type of the artifact (e.g., library, plugin, module).

domain.description: Application domain (e.g., Data Processing, Machine Learning).

techStack.description: List of technologies, frameworks, environments, deployment styles, runtimes, or other key technology elements used by this artifact. E.g., ["Spring Boot", "JPA", "PostgreSQL", "Docker", "Kubernetes", "Microservices", "Java 17"].

items.description: A technology, runtime, framework, environment, or deployment option.

features.description: Main features or capabilities provided by the artifact.

signature.description: The full signature of the feature (e.g., Java method signature).

description.description: Detailed description of the example snippet.

customizations.description: Extension or customization points for developers to extend or modify the artifact's functionality.

name.description: Name of the customization or extension point (e.g., class, interface, method).

description.description: Detailed description of the extension or customization point.

type.description: Type of customization point (e.g., method, interface, configuration property).

description.description: Detailed description of the example snippet.

studs.description: A list of interfaces or abstract classes defined in this artifact, intended for implementation or extension by other modules to support forking, plugin, or extension scenarios.

name.description: Fully qualified name of the interface or abstract class, as exported in this artifact.

type.description: Kind of stub: always 'interface' or 'abstract class' as provided by this artifact.

description.description: Summary of the purpose and intended use of this interface or abstract class.
Detailed description of the example snippet.

implement.description: Fully qualified name of the class in this artifact that implements or extends this stub.
